title: Billionaire Gautam Adani charged in New York with massive fraud, bribery
content: Gautam Adani and others are charged in the New York indictment with paying Indian government officials $250 million to secure solar energy supply contracts.
summary: Gautam Adani and others are charged in the New York indictment with paying Indian government officials $250 million to secure solar energy supply contracts.

title: Nvidia nearly doubles revenue on strong AI demand
content: Nvidia reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.
summary: Nvidia reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

title: Walmart hits new highs and Target dives after earnings as rivals diverge even more
content: Both discounters are contending with price-conscious shoppers, but Walmart reported improving trends with discretionary merchandise.
summary: Both discounters are contending with price-conscious shoppers, but Walmart reported improving trends with discretionary merchandise.

title: Alphabet's VC arm backs little-known SAP rival Odoo, boosting valuation to $5.3 billion
content: Odoo, an enterprise software startup rivalling SAP, boosted its valuation to $5.3 billion in a secondary share round led by Alphabet's VC fund and Sequoia.
summary: Odoo, an enterprise software startup rivalling SAP, boosted its valuation to $5.3 billion in a secondary share round led by Alphabet's VC fund and Sequoia.

title: European Central Banks warns of trade tension risks to euro zone financial stability
content: The Financial Stability Review also said weak growth was now a bigger threat to the 20-nation euro zone than high inflation.
summary: The Financial Stability Review also said weak growth was now a bigger threat to the 20-nation euro zone than high inflation.

title: Comcast to spin off cable networks as subscribers flee the bundle
content: Comcast on Wednesday announced the spinoff of its cable networks, including CNBC, MSNBC and E!.
summary: Comcast on Wednesday announced the spinoff of its cable networks, including CNBC, MSNBC and E!.

title: FTX co-founder Gary Wang avoids prison time for role in crypto fraud
content: Gary Wang was the fifth former FTX executive to be handed a punishment for his role in the collapse of the crypto exchange in late 2022.
summary: Gary Wang was the fifth former FTX executive to be handed a punishment for his role in the collapse of the crypto exchange in late 2022.

title: U.S. closes embassy in Kyiv over potential 'significant' air attack as tensions with Russia soar
content: The U.S. has closed its embassy in Kyiv, warning that it has "received specific information of a potential significant air attack" on Wednesday.
summary: The U.S. has closed its embassy in Kyiv, warning that it has "received specific information of a potential significant air attack" on Wednesday.

title: Thailand legalizing same-sex marriage is likely to bring a flood of tourists
content: Thailand's same-sex marriage law could add 4 million tourists and $2 billion in tourism revenue per year, according to a report commissioned by Agoda.
summary: Thailand's same-sex marriage law could add 4 million tourists and $2 billion in tourism revenue per year, according to a report commissioned by Agoda.

title: Rafael Nadal has made $134 million in career prize money, will retire as No. 2 highest-earning tennis player ever
content: The 38-year-old's career earnings are surpassed only by Novak Djokovic's.
summary: The 38-year-old's career earnings are surpassed only by Novak Djokovic's.

title: Ethics Committee deadlocks on releasing Matt Gaetz sex, drug probe report
content: The outcome means that the report on Matt Gaetz, who is President-elect Donald Trump's pick to be the next U.S. attorney general, will not be released for now.
summary: The outcome means that the report on Matt Gaetz, who is President-elect Donald Trump's pick to be the next U.S. attorney general, will not be released for now.

title: Euro-dollar parity is back in focus as Trump win sparks trade jitters
content: The euro last traded at $1 and below in 2022, but fresh developments have put parity back on the agenda.
summary: The euro last traded at $1 and below in 2022, but fresh developments have put parity back on the agenda.

title: What Trump's return to the White House could mean for global bond yields
content: It is thought that Trump's pledge to introduce tax cuts and steep tariffs could boost economic growth — but widen the fiscal deficit and refuel inflation.
summary: It is thought that Trump's pledge to introduce tax cuts and steep tariffs could boost economic growth — but widen the fiscal deficit and refuel inflation.

title: UK inflation surges above Bank of England's 2% target, curbing December rate cut expectations
content: The hike marks a sharp increase from the 1.7% rise recorded in September and exceeds the 2.2% forecast of economists polled by Reuters.
summary: The hike marks a sharp increase from the 1.7% rise recorded in September and exceeds the 2.2% forecast of economists polled by Reuters.

title: Jim Cramer wants to buy this falling tech stock — and touts another reason to like Disney
content: The Investing Club holds its "Morning Meeting" every weekday at 10:20 a.m. ET.
summary: The Investing Club holds its "Morning Meeting" every weekday at 10:20 a.m. ET.

title: Japan exports rise more than expected in October, rebounding from 43-month low
content: Japan's trade deficit expanded to 461.2 billion yen ($2.98 billion), compared to September's revised figure of 294.1 billion yen.
summary: Japan's trade deficit expanded to 461.2 billion yen ($2.98 billion), compared to September's revised figure of 294.1 billion yen.

title: Delta expects higher profits thanks to high-end travel and 'resilient economy'
content: Delta, the most profitable U.S. airline, expects to expand capacity by no more than 4% year-over-year in 2025.
summary: Delta, the most profitable U.S. airline, expects to expand capacity by no more than 4% year-over-year in 2025.

title: Target shares plunge 21% after discounter cuts forecast, posts biggest earnings miss in two years
content: Target missed on earnings and revenue even as it cut prices on thousands of items, including milk, diapers and toys, to try to attract discerning shoppers.
summary: Target missed on earnings and revenue even as it cut prices on thousands of items, including milk, diapers and toys, to try to attract discerning shoppers.

title: U.S. 'industrial renaissance' is fueling a rebound in fundraising, Apollo CEO Marc Rowan says
content: Capital raising activity is set for a rebound in the U.S. amid a global "industrial renaissance," Oaktree Capital Management Co-Chairman Howard Marks says.
summary: Capital raising activity is set for a rebound in the U.S. amid a global "industrial renaissance," Oaktree Capital Management Co-Chairman Howard Marks says.

title: China expectedly keeps benchmark lending rates steady as Beijing assesses stimulus measures
content: The People's Bank of China said it would keep the one-year loan prime rate at 3.1%, while holding the five-year LPR at 3.6%.
summary: The People's Bank of China said it would keep the one-year loan prime rate at 3.1%, while holding the five-year LPR at 3.6%.

title: Seven & i shares surge on report its founding family is raising over $50 billion to take the firm private
content: NHK said the founding family will raise over 8 trillion yen from "three Japanese megabanks and major American financial institutions."
summary: NHK said the founding family will raise over 8 trillion yen from "three Japanese megabanks and major American financial institutions."

title: Trump tariffs to push down U.S. growth 'a great deal' going into 2026, Morgan Stanley warns
content: Donald Trump's proposed tariffs will dent U.S. economic growth going into 2026, said Morgan Stanley's chief global economist Seth Carpenter.
summary: Donald Trump's proposed tariffs will dent U.S. economic growth going into 2026, said Morgan Stanley's chief global economist Seth Carpenter.

title: Qualcomm says it expects $4 billion in PC chip sales by 2029, as company gets traction beyond smartphones
content: Qualcomm said on Tuesday that it expects its push into new markets to generate an additional $22 billion per year by 2029.
summary: Qualcomm said on Tuesday that it expects its push into new markets to generate an additional $22 billion per year by 2029.

title: Russia says Ukraine attacked it using U.S. long-range missiles, signals it's ready for nuclear response
content: Russia has signaled to the West it's ready for a nuclear confrontation.
summary: Russia has signaled to the West it's ready for a nuclear confrontation.

title: SpaceX completes sixth Starship flight, splashes down both booster and spacecraft
content: SpaceX launched its sixth Starship test flight to date on Tuesday.
summary: SpaceX launched its sixth Starship test flight to date on Tuesday.

title: Market veteran Howard Marks cautions that China's economic growth target is a 'Herculean challenge'
content: Veteran investor Howard Marks is hopeful about China's economy, but cautions that the country's growth target is a monumental challenge.
summary: Veteran investor Howard Marks is hopeful about China's economy, but cautions that the country's growth target is a monumental challenge.

title: Doubts mount over Britain’s ambitious growth plans — with warnings of further tax rises possible
content: Doubts are mounting over the Labour government's flagship growth and investment agenda, with one analyst warning further tax rises could be on the horizon.
summary: Doubts are mounting over the Labour government's flagship growth and investment agenda, with one analyst warning further tax rises could be on the horizon.

title: Russia-U.S. tensions briefly hit global markets as Putin lowers the threshold for a nuclear strike
content: Stocks briefly fell and investors fled to safe haven assets on Tuesday, as global markets reacted to escalating tensions between the world's two largest nuclear powers.
summary: Stocks briefly fell and investors fled to safe haven assets on Tuesday, as global markets reacted to escalating tensions between the world's two largest nuclear powers.

title: Trump picks Dr. Oz to lead massive Medicare and Medicaid agency CMS
content: Dr. Mehmet Oz previously ran for a Senate seat from Pennsylvania. CMS is one of the biggest agencies in the U.S. government, overseeing Medicare and Medicaid.
summary: Dr. Mehmet Oz previously ran for a Senate seat from Pennsylvania. CMS is one of the biggest agencies in the U.S. government, overseeing Medicare and Medicaid.

title: A double whammy of tariffs and strikes is coming for U.S. trade and the global supply chain in early 2025
content: Shippers and logistics companies are gaming out a complex early 2025 as President-elect Donald Trump may hike tariffs, and East and Gulf Coast ports may strike.
summary: Shippers and logistics companies are gaming out a complex early 2025 as President-elect Donald Trump may hike tariffs, and East and Gulf Coast ports may strike.
